data.name: Far Far Away From Here
data.detailed_description:
Very far away - Once upon a time in the same kingdom there lived a king .. No, he did not sit all his life on his throne, he was very fond of adventure and danger. Take over the reins of the rebellious king and show the goblins who's in charge! Collect coins stolen by enemies and dodge their well-aimed shots in this adventure server and restore order in your kingdom. You, as a representative, go to collect data, meeting sweepers on the way, go all the way so that your treasury is full


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics By Crock
- Nice soundtrack By Crock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP\ Vista \ 7 \ 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 400 or later
  • Storage: 28 MB available space
